00039 #include "Point3D.h"
00040 #include "Vector3D.h"
00041 
00042 Point3D::Point3D( double dx, double dy, double dz )
00043 : x(dx), y(dy), z(dz)
00044 {
00045 }
00046 
00047 Point3D::~Point3D( )
00048 {
00049 }
00050 
00051 Point3D& Point3D::operator+=( const Point3D& point )
00052 {
00053     x += point.x;
00054     y += point.y;
00055     z += point.z;
00056     return *this;
00057 }
00058  
00059 Point3D& Point3D::operator+=( const Vector3D& vector )
00060 {
00061     x += vector.x;
00062     y += vector.y;
00063     z += vector.z;
00064     return *this;
00065 }
00066 
00067 Point3D& Point3D::operator-=( const Vector3D& vector )
00068 {
00069     x -= vector.x;
00070     y -= vector.y;
00071     z -= vector.z;
00072     return *this;
00073 }
00074 
00075 Point3D& Point3D::operator*=( double scalar )
00076 {
00077     x *= scalar;
00078     y *= scalar;
00079     z *= scalar;
00080     return *this;
00081 }
00082 
00083 Point3D& Point3D::operator/=( double scalar )
00084 {
00085     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00086     x *= inv;
00087     y *= inv;
00088     z *= inv;
00089     return *this;    
00090 }
00091 
00092 bool Point3D::operator==( const Point3D& point ) const
00093 {
00094         if( this == &point ) return true;
00095     else return( ( x == point.x ) && ( y == point.y ) && ( z == point.z ) );
00096 } 
00097   
00098 bool Point3D::operator!=( const Point3D& point ) const
00099 {
00100         if( this == &point ) return false;
00101     else return ( x != point.x ) || ( y != point.y ) || ( z != point.z );
00102 }
00103     
00104 double Point3D::operator[]( int i ) const
00105 {
00106     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00107     else return (i == 1) ? y : z;
00108 }
00109 
00110 double& Point3D::operator[]( int i )
00111 {
00112     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00113     else return (i == 1) ? y : z;
00114 }
00115 
00116 Point3D operator+( const Point3D& lhs, const Point3D& rhs )
00117 {
00118     return Point3D( lhs.x + rhs.x, lhs.y + rhs.y, lhs.z + rhs.z );
00119 }
00120 
00121 Point3D operator+( const Point3D& lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00122 {
00123     return Point3D( lhs.x + rhs.x, lhs.y + rhs.y, lhs.z + rhs.z );
00124 }
00125 
00126 Vector3D operator-( const Point3D& lhs, const Point3D& rhs )
00127 {
00128     return Vector3D( lhs.x - rhs.x, lhs.y - rhs.y, lhs.z - rhs.z );
00129 }
00130 
00131 Point3D operator-( const Point3D& lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00132 {
00133     return Point3D( lhs.x - rhs.x, lhs.y - rhs.y, lhs.z - rhs.z );
00134 }
00135 
00136 Point3D operator*( const Point3D& point, double scalar )
00137 {
00138     return Point3D( point.x*scalar, point.y*scalar, point.z*scalar );
00139 }
00140 
00141 Point3D operator*( double scalar, const Point3D& point )
00142 {
00143     return Point3D( point.x*scalar, point.y*scalar, point.z*scalar );
00144 }
00145 
00146 Point3D operator/( const Point3D& point, double scalar )
00147 {
00148     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00149     return Point3D( point.x*inv, point.y*inv, point.z*inv );
00150 }
00151 
00152 std::ostream &operator<<( std::ostream &os, const Point3D& pA )
00153 {
00154     os << pA.x << ", " << pA.y << ", " << pA.z;
00155     return os;
00156 }
00157 
00158 double Distance( const Point3D& pA, const Point3D& pB )
00159 {
00160     return ( pA - pB ).Length();
00161 }
00162 
00163 double DistanceSquared( const Point3D& pA, const Point3D& pB )
00164 {
00165     return ( pA - pB ).LengthSquared();
00166 }
